member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions
member.summary: Represents a class that provides various helper methods used to find the child and parent of visual object from visual tree.
member.remarks: Since many of these extension methods are declared on types like DependencyObject high up in the class hierarchy, we've placed them in the Primitives namespace which is less likely to be imported for normal scenarios.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualAncestors(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Helps to find the ancestor elements of the provided visual object by searching in visual tree.
member.returns: The visual tree ancestors of the element.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualAncestorsAndSelf(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Helps to find the ancestor of a given element in the visual tree or find the object itself if it matches.
member.returns: The visual tree ancestors of an element and the element itself.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualChildren(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Helps to iterate and return a collection of visual children from the object in visual tree.
member.returns: The visual tree children of an element.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualChildrenAndSelf(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Helps to find the visual children of a given element in the visual tree or find the object itself if it matches.
member.returns: The visual tree children of an element and the element itself.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualDescendants(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Helps to find the child elements of the provided visual object by searching in visual tree.
member.returns: The visual tree descendants of an element.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualDescendantsAndSelf(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Get the visual tree descendants of an element and the element itself.
member.returns: The visual tree descendants of an element and the element itself.

member.summary: Helps to find the siblings of the provided element by searching in visual tree.
member.returns: The visual tree siblings of an element.

member.summary: Helps to find the siblings of a given element in the visual tree or find the object itself if it matches.
member.returns: The visual tree siblings of an element and the element itself.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetBoundsRelativeTo(Windows.UI.Xaml.FrameworkElement,Windows.UI.Xaml.UIElement)
member.summary: Returns the size of an UI element and its position relative to another framework element.
member.param: The element relative to the other element.
member.returns: The bounds of the element relative to another element, or null if the elements are not related.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.InvokeOnLayoutUpdated(Windows.UI.Xaml.FrameworkElement,System.Action)
member.summary: Occurs when the layout of the visual tree changes due to its relative properties value changes or when any other action is performed.

member.summary: Get the visual tree ancestors of an element and the element itself.
member.returns: The visual tree ancestors of an element and the element itself.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualChildrenAndSelfIterator(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Get the visual tree children of an element and the element itself.
member.returns: The visual tree children of an element and the element itself.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.VisualTreeExtensions.GetVisualDescendantsAndSelfIterator(Windows.UI.Xaml.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Get the visual tree descendants of an element and the element itself.
member.returns: The visual tree descendants of an element and the element itself.
